sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.CORR_DVSN_CD ,T1.ACP_YR ,T1.CORR_ACP_NO ,T1.SRNO ,F_USR_INFO_BY_ID(T1.PET_ID,'2') AS PET_NM ,F_DPT_INFO(T1.PET_DPT_CD,'1') AS PET_DPT_NM ,T1.PET_TXT ,T2.ACP_YR||'-부감-'||T2.RM_CORR_ACP_NO AS ACP_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.FRT_REGI_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS FRT_REGI_DH FROM TBCSPCOR103H T1 ,TBCSPCOR101M T2 WHERE T1.CORR_DVSN_CD = #strCORR_DVSN_CD# AND T1.ACP_YR = #strACP_YR# AND T1.CORR_ACP_NO = #strCORR_ACP_NO# AND T1.CORR_DVSN_CD = T2.CORR_DVSN_CD AND T1.CORR_ACP_NO = T2.CORR_ACP_NO AND T1.ACP_YR = T2.ACP_YR ORDER BY T1.SRNO ASC
